name: Loadouts/TFTPlaybooks/AurelionSol
translatedDescription: Become high level and play awesome units!

earlyAugments.name: Cutting Corners
earlyAugments.description: Leveling up costs @Experience@ XP less.

earlyAugments.name: Patient Study
earlyAugments.description: After player combat, gain @winxp@ XP if you won or @lossxp@ XP if you lost.

earlyAugments.name: Level Up!
earlyAugments.description: When you buy XP, gain an additional @XP@. Gain @InitialXP@ immediately.

midAugments.name: Knowledge Download I
midAugments.description: Gain @Experience@ XP.

midAugments.name: Knowledge Download II
midAugments.description: Gain @Experience@ XP.

midAugments.name: Knowledge Download III
midAugments.description: Gain @Experience@ XP.

lateAugments.name: It Pays To Learn
lateAugments.description: Gain @XP@ XP and @Gold@ gold.

lateAugments.name: It Pays to Learn II
lateAugments.description: Gain @XP@ XP and @Gold@ gold.

lateAugments.name: It Pays to Learn III
lateAugments.description: Gain @XP@ XP and @Gold@ gold.

name: Loadouts/TFTPlaybooks/Bard
translatedDescription: Gain even more power when you level up!

earlyAugments.name: Caretaker's Ally
earlyAugments.description:
Gain a random @UnitTier@-cost champion now. Gain the same one again every time you level up.

Champion: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Augment_WorthTheWait@

earlyAugments.name: Caretaker's Favor
earlyAugments.description:
Gain a component anvil when you reach level @levelreqa@, @levelreqb@, @levelreqc@, and @levelreqd@.

The anvil offers 4 choices.

earlyAugments.name: Caretaker's Chosen
earlyAugments.description:
As you level, gain more powerful items.
Level @levelreqa@: component anvil
Level @levelreqb@: completed item anvil
Level @levelreqc@: choose 1 of 5 Radiant items

midAugments.name: Small Forge
midAugments.description: Gain a component anvil and @gold@ gold.

midAugments.name: Medium Forge
midAugments.description: Gain a completed item anvil and @gold@ gold.

midAugments.name: Large Forge
midAugments.description: Gain an Artifact anvil and a component item anvil.

lateAugments.name: Teaming Up I
lateAugments.description: Gain @NumComponents@ random component and @NumChamps@ random Tier 3 champions.

lateAugments.name: Teaming Up II
lateAugments.description: Gain @NumItems@ random Support item and @NumUnits@ random 4-cost champions.

lateAugments.name: Teaming Up III
lateAugments.description: Gain @NumItems@ Support Anvil, @NumComponents@ random component, and @NumUnits@ random Tier 4 champions.

name: Loadouts/TFTPlaybooks/Caitlyn
translatedDescription: Get strong units at the start of the game!

earlyAugments.name: Ones Twos Three
earlyAugments.description: Gain @tier1champs@ 1-cost champion, @numchamps@ 2-cost champions, and 1 3-cost champion.

earlyAugments.name: Stars are Born
earlyAugments.description: The first 1-cost and 2-cost champions you buy are instantly upgraded to 2-star. Gain @Gold@ gold.

earlyAugments.name: Starter Kit
earlyAugments.description:
Gain a 4-cost champion, a 2-star 1-cost champion that shares a trait with them, and @Gold@ gold.

At the start of the next @FutureChampionCount@ stages, gain that 4-cost champion again.

midAugments.name: Knowledge Download I
midAugments.description: Gain @Experience@ XP.

midAugments.name: Knowledge Download II
midAugments.description: Gain @Experience@ XP.

midAugments.name: Knowledge Download III
midAugments.description: Gain @Experience@ XP.

lateAugments.name: Rolling For Days I
lateAugments.description: Gain @Numrolls@ free Shop rerolls.

lateAugments.name: Rolling For Days II
lateAugments.description: Gain @Numrolls@ free Shop rerolls.

lateAugments.name: Rolling For Days III
lateAugments.description: Gain @Numrolls@ free Shop rerolls.

name: Loadouts/TFTPlaybooks/Draven
translatedDescription: Win big and get bigger payouts!

earlyAugments.name: Spoils of War I
earlyAugments.description: Enemies have a @LootDropChance*100@% chance to drop loot when killed.

earlyAugments.name: Spoils of War II
earlyAugments.description: Enemies have a @LootDropChance*100@% chance to drop loot when killed.

earlyAugments.name: Spoils of War III
earlyAugments.description: Enemies have a @LootDropChance*100@% chance to drop loot when killed.

midAugments.name: Balanced Budget
midAugments.description: At the start of the next @rounds@ rounds, gain @gold@ gold.

midAugments.name: Balanced Budget
midAugments.description: At the start of the next @rounds@ rounds, gain @gold@ gold.

midAugments.name: Balanced Budget III
midAugments.description: At the start of the next @rounds@ rounds, gain @gold@ gold.

lateAugments.name: Rolling For Days I
lateAugments.description: Gain @Numrolls@ free Shop rerolls.

lateAugments.name: Rolling For Days II
lateAugments.description: Gain @Numrolls@ free Shop rerolls.

lateAugments.name: Rolling For Days III
lateAugments.description: Gain @Numrolls@ free Shop rerolls.

earlyAugments.name: Buried Treasures I
earlyAugments.description: Gain a random item component at the start of the next @roundsofbonusitems@ rounds (including this round).

earlyAugments.name: Buried Treasures II
earlyAugments.description: Gain a random item component at the start of the next @roundsofbonusitems@ rounds (including this round).

earlyAugments.name: Buried Treasures III
earlyAugments.description: Gain a random item component at the start of the next @roundsofbonusitems@ rounds (including this round).

midAugments.name: Tiny Grab Bag
midAugments.description: Gain a random component, @Gold@ gold, a Magnetic Remover.

midAugments.name: Big Grab Bag
midAugments.description:
Gain @NumItems@ random components, @Gold@ gold, and 1 Reforger.

Reforgers allow you to remake any item.

midAugments.name: Giant Grab Bag
midAugments.description: Gain @NumItems@ random components, @Gold@ gold, and a Lesser Champion Duplicator.

lateAugments.name: Well-Earned Comforts I
lateAugments.description: Your units gain @Health@ Health for each item equipped.

lateAugments.name: Well-Earned Comforts II
lateAugments.description: Your units gain @Health@ Health for each item equipped.

lateAugments.name: Well-Earned Comforts III
lateAugments.description: Your units gain @Health@ Health and @AttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed for each item equipped.

name: Loadouts/TFTPlaybooks/LeeSin
translatedDescription: Reroll your Shop for perfect champions!

earlyAugments.name: Silver Ticket
earlyAugments.description: Gain a free Shop reroll after every @RollNumber@ rerolls. Gain @Gold@ gold.

earlyAugments.name: Trade Sector
earlyAugments.description: Gain a free Shop reroll every round. Gain @Gold@ gold.

earlyAugments.name: Shopping Spree
earlyAugments.description: When you level up, gain a number of free shop refreshes equal to your level+@BonusRollPerLevel@. Gain @gold@ gold.

midAugments.name: Training Reward
midAugments.description: Gain @Gold@ gold and a Lesser Champion Duplicator.

midAugments.name: Training Reward II
midAugments.description: Gain @Gold@ gold and a Lesser Champion Duplicator.

midAugments.name: Training Reward III
midAugments.description: Gain @Gold@ gold and a Champion Duplicator.

lateAugments.name: Money!
lateAugments.description: Gain @gold@ gold. In @Numberofcombats@ turns, gain @gold@ gold again.

lateAugments.name: Money Money!
lateAugments.description: Gain @gold@ gold. In @Numberofcombats@ turns, gain @gold@ gold again.

lateAugments.name: Money Money Money!
lateAugments.description: Gain @gold@ gold. In @Numberofcombats@ turns, gain @gold@ gold again.

name: Loadouts/TFTPlaybooks/MasterYi
translatedDescription: Grow stronger and stronger with every fight!

earlyAugments.name: Pumping Up I
earlyAugments.description: Your team gains @BaseAS@% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain @IncreasePerRound@% more. (current Attack Speed: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT9_PumpingUpRounds@%)

earlyAugments.name: Pumping Up II
earlyAugments.description: Your team gains @BaseAS@% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain @IncreasePerRound@% more. (current Attack Speed: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT9_PumpingUp2Rounds@%)

earlyAugments.name: Pumping Up III
earlyAugments.description: Your team gains @BaseAS@% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain @IncreasePerRound@% more. (current Attack Speed: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT9_PumpingUp3Rounds@%)

midAugments.name: Battle Ready
midAugments.description: Your team deals @BonusDamage@% more damage and takes @DR@% less damage.

midAugments.name: Battle Ready II
midAugments.description: Your team deals @BonusDamage@% more damage and takes @DR@% less damage.

midAugments.name: Battle Ready III
midAugments.description: Your team deals @BonusDamage@% more damage and takes @DR@% less damage.

lateAugments.name: Gotta Go Fast!
lateAugments.description: Your team creates @PercentMana@% more Mana and moves @BonusMovementSpeed@% faster.

lateAugments.name: Gotta Go Fast! II
lateAugments.description: Your team creates @PercentMana@% more Mana and moves @BonusMovementSpeed@% faster.

lateAugments.name: Gotta Go Fast!!! III
lateAugments.description: Your team creates @PercentMana@% more Mana and moves @BonusMovementSpeed@% faster.

name: Loadouts/TFTPlaybooks/Ornn
translatedDescription: Gain the power of Ornn's creations!

earlyAugments.name: Latent Forge
earlyAugments.description:
After @NumberOfCombats@ player combats, gain an Artifact anvil.

The anvil offers 4 choices. Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

earlyAugments.name: Portable Forge
earlyAugments.description:
Choose 1 of @ArmoryChoiceCount@ Artifacts.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

earlyAugments.name: Living Forge
earlyAugments.description:
Gain an Artifact anvil now and after every @NumberOfCombats@ player combats.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

midAugments.name: Small Forge
midAugments.description: Gain a component anvil and @gold@ gold.

midAugments.name: Medium Forge
midAugments.description: Gain a completed item anvil and @gold@ gold.

midAugments.name: Large Forge
midAugments.description: Gain an Artifact anvil and a component item anvil.

lateAugments.name: Job's Done
lateAugments.description: Gain @anvils@ component anvil and @RandomComponents@ random component.

lateAugments.name: Job Well Done
lateAugments.description: Gain a completed item anvil and @RandomComponents@ random component.

lateAugments.name: Masterful Job
lateAugments.description: Gain an Artifact anvil and a completed item anvil.

name: Loadouts/TFTPlaybooks/Pengu
translatedDescription: Play it safe! Great for beginners!

earlyAugments.name: Tiny Titans
earlyAugments.description: Increase your current and max player health by @heal@.

earlyAugments.name: Metabolic Accelerator
earlyAugments.description: Gain @Heal@ player health after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.

earlyAugments.name: Tiniest Titan
earlyAugments.description: Gain @Heal@ player health and @Gold@ gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.

midAugments.name: Item Grab Bag I
midAugments.description: Gain @NumItems@ random completed item.

midAugments.name: Item Grab Bag II
midAugments.description: Gain a random completed item, a random component, and @Gold@ gold.

midAugments.name: Item Grab Bag III
midAugments.description: Gain @NumFullItems@ random completed items and @Gold@ Gold.

lateAugments.name: Final Grab Bag
lateAugments.description: Gain a random component, @Gold@ gold, and a Reforger.

lateAugments.name: Final Grab Bag II
lateAugments.description: Gain @NumItems@ random components, @Gold@ gold, and a Magnetic Remover.

lateAugments.name: Urf's Grab Bag
lateAugments.description: Gain @NumItems@ random components, a Champion Duplicator, and a Spatula.

name: Loadouts/TFTPlaybooks/Poro
translatedDescription: No tailoring, just a classic game of TFT!

name: Loadouts/TFTPlaybooks/TahmKench
translatedDescription: Collect as much gold as possible!

earlyAugments.name: AFK
earlyAugments.description: You cannot perform actions for the next @RoundsToSkip@ rounds. Afterwards, gain @Gold@ gold.

earlyAugments.name: Rich Get Richer
earlyAugments.description:
Gain @Gold@ gold. Your max interest is increased to @InterestCap@.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

earlyAugments.name: Hedge Fund
earlyAugments.description:
Gain @Gold@ gold. Your max interest is increased to @InterestCap@.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

midAugments.name: Balanced Budget
midAugments.description: At the start of the next @rounds@ rounds, gain @gold@ gold.

midAugments.name: Balanced Budget
midAugments.description: At the start of the next @rounds@ rounds, gain @gold@ gold.

midAugments.name: Balanced Budget III
midAugments.description: At the start of the next @rounds@ rounds, gain @gold@ gold.

lateAugments.description: Gain @gold@ gold. In @Numberofcombats@ turns, gain @gold@ gold again.

lateAugments.name: Money Money Money!
lateAugments.description: Gain @gold@ gold. In @Numberofcombats@ turns, gain @gold@ gold again.

name: Loadouts/TFTPlaybooks/TwistedFate
translatedDescription: Get the exact items you need!

earlyAugments.name: Pandora's Items
earlyAugments.description:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized.

Gain @NumComponents@ random component.

earlyAugments.name: Pandora's Items II
earlyAugments.description:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized.

Gain @NumComponents@ random components.

earlyAugments.name: Pandora's Items III
earlyAugments.description:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized.

Gain 1 random Radiant item.

midAugments.name: Item Grab Bag I
midAugments.description: Gain @NumItems@ random completed item.

midAugments.name: Item Grab Bag II
midAugments.description: Gain a random completed item, a random component, and @Gold@ gold.

midAugments.name: Item Grab Bag III
midAugments.description: Gain @NumFullItems@ random completed items and @Gold@ Gold.

lateAugments.name: Teaming Up I
lateAugments.description: Gain @NumComponents@ random component and @NumChamps@ random Tier 3 champions.

lateAugments.name: Teaming Up II
lateAugments.description: Gain @NumItems@ random Support item and @NumUnits@ random 4-cost champions.

lateAugments.name: Teaming Up III
lateAugments.description: Gain @NumItems@ Support Anvil, @NumComponents@ random component, and @NumUnits@ random Tier 4 champions.

name: Loadouts/TFTPlaybooks/Urf
translatedDescription: For the player that loves emblems!

earlyAugments.name: Branching Out
earlyAugments.description:
Gain a random Emblem and a Reforger.

Reforgers allow you to remake any item.

earlyAugments.name: Ancient Archives I
earlyAugments.description: Gain @NumTomes@ Tome of Traits and @Gold@ gold.

earlyAugments.name: Ancient Archives II
earlyAugments.description: Gain @NumTomes@ Tome of Traits and @Gold@ gold.

midAugments.description: Gain a random component, @Gold@ gold, a Magnetic Remover.

midAugments.name: Big Grab Bag
midAugments.description:
Gain @NumItems@ random components, @Gold@ gold, and 1 Reforger.

Reforgers allow you to remake any item.

midAugments.name: Giant Grab Bag
midAugments.description: Gain @NumItems@ random components, @Gold@ gold, and a Lesser Champion Duplicator.

lateAugments.description: Gain a random component, @Gold@ gold, and a Reforger.

lateAugments.name: Final Grab Bag II

lateAugments.name: Urf's Grab Bag

name: Loadouts/TFTPlaybooks/Veigar
translatedDescription: Deal big damage with your champions' abilities!

earlyAugments.name: Jeweled Lotus I
earlyAugments.description: Combat start: Your strongest unit gains @CritChance@% Critical Strike Chance and their abilities can critically strike.

earlyAugments.name: Jeweled Lotus II
earlyAugments.description: Your team gains @critchance@% Critical Strike chance, and their Abilities can critically strike.

earlyAugments.name: Jeweled Lotus III
earlyAugments.description: Your team gains @critchance@% Critical Strike chance, and their Abilities can critically strike.

midAugments.name: Tiny Power I
midAugments.description: Your team gains @ap@% Attack Damage, Ability Power, and Attack Speed.

midAugments.name: Tiny Power II
midAugments.description: Your team gains @ap@% Attack Damage, Ability Power, and Attack Speed.

midAugments.name: Tiny Power III
midAugments.description: Your team gains @ap@% Attack Damage, Ability Power, and Attack Speed.

lateAugments.name: Partial Ascension
lateAugments.description: After @Delay@ seconds of combat, your units gain @DamageAmp@% Damage Amp.

lateAugments.name: Ascension
lateAugments.description: After @Delay@ seconds of combat, your units gain @DamageAmp@% Damage Amp.

lateAugments.name: Final Ascension
lateAugments.description: Your team gains @damageamp@% Damage Amp. After @delay@ seconds, this increases to @AscendedAmpTOOLTIPONLY@% Damage Amp.

earlyAugments.name: Transfusion I
earlyAugments.description: Your units gain @BaseHP@ Health, plus @BonusHPPerMissingHealth@ Health per missing Tactician Health.

earlyAugments.name: Transfusion II
earlyAugments.description: Your units gain @BaseHP@ Health, plus @BonusHPPerMissingHealth@ Health per missing Tactician Health.

earlyAugments.name: Transfusion III
earlyAugments.description: Your units gain @BaseHP@ Health, plus @BonusHPPerMissingHealth@ Health per missing Tactician Health.

midAugments.name: Battle Ready
midAugments.description: Your team deals @BonusDamage@% more damage and takes @DR@% less damage.

midAugments.name: Battle Ready II
midAugments.description: Your team deals @BonusDamage@% more damage and takes @DR@% less damage.

midAugments.name: Battle Ready III
midAugments.description: Your team deals @BonusDamage@% more damage and takes @DR@% less damage.

lateAugments.name: Partial Ascension
lateAugments.description: After @Delay@ seconds of combat, your units gain @DamageAmp@% Damage Amp.

lateAugments.name: Ascension
lateAugments.description: After @Delay@ seconds of combat, your units gain @DamageAmp@% Damage Amp.

lateAugments.name: Final Ascension
lateAugments.description: Your team gains @damageamp@% Damage Amp. After @delay@ seconds, this increases to @AscendedAmpTOOLTIPONLY@% Damage Amp.
